vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_rdsyssoft3(unsigned short FlibHndl, short s_id, short *read_num, short *all_num, ODBSYSS3 *syssoft3);

doc.cmn:
Reads the series/version of CNC system software.
These information are stored in each member of ODBSYSS3.
This function can read the series/version information of the system software that can be used on the system.
There is no data depends on the path.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

Specify starting ID of series/version information that you want to read.
This function gathers IDs from the specified one to larger ones.
When you want to read all series/version information, first specify as "s_id = 0", then repeat the reading by specifying as s_id = (last acquired s_id) + 1"

Specify the pointer for the number of software information to be read.
This function returns the number of data that was read actually.
Valid data range is 1,...,40.
When no data is read, "read_num = 0" is returned.
Specify the pointer for the number of all software information.

item.name: syssoft3
item.content:
Pointer to the ODBSYSS3 structure for the data of the series/version of CNC system software. The number of array must be required so as to store the 'read_num'.
The ODBSYSS3 structure is as follows.
typedef struct odbsyss3 { short soft_id ; /* Software ID */ char soft_series[5] ; /* Software series */ char soft_edition[5] ; /* Software version */ } ODBSYSS3 ;
soft_id Software ID Pointer to the ODBSYSS3 structure for the data of the series/version of CNC system software. The array of this structure that is specified by (*read_num) is required. - FS30i/31i-32i-A, 0i-D

soft_series Software series Software series information is stored in ASCII code in order of its position (4 byte + 'NULL').
soft_edition Software version Software series information is stored in ASCII code in order of its position (4 byte + 'NULL').

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 0i-D, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.
